chapter.title: Rules of Engagement
chapter.para: This book was written by a science major who believes that the scientific method is the best way for making decisions in the public sphere such as the role that cycling is going to play in a modern transporation system.
Additionally, I write this as a human meditator who strives to increase the world net happiness. Thus, one's feeling should also be taken into account.
Thus, I seek to marry both styles. To make decisions based on research, but the basis of decisions is what makes the world, ultimately, a happier and healthier place.
